name: ManaBook Book Kit File
summary: Learn about .MBBK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MBBK files are used in conjunction with .MBB files for organizing ManaBook books.

description: File created by ManaBook, a Microsoft Word add-in used to combine multiple Word documents into a single "book"; contains a template, or "kit", that allows users to create new book documents that use the same page layout; used for managing many documents through a single interface.
